main_definition: Evans can refer to a surname, an idiomatic phrase, or be used as a name in different contexts.

meanings_and_examples.example: David Evans is the owner of a successful bakery.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A variant spelling of the surname 'Evans', often found in Welsh names with an English form.
meanings_and_examples.example: Gareth Evan, which is a version of the name Evans used by individuals of Welsh descent who have adapted to English naming conventions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic phrase related to wealth and success
meanings_and_examples.example: He's living large like an 'Evans', always in luxury with no apparent financial worries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Name given to fictional characters or public figures
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Evans' is a character name used by author J.K. Rowling for her Harry Potter series, as well as in various other books and movies.
